title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not close all the opened editors. This issue can be observed when following these steps: Close all editors, create a new file 'f1.txt', and then select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. However, nothing happens when this menu option is selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Close all opened editors. 3. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
